public class ReverseClassLoader
extends org.eclipse.jetty.server.handler.AbstractHandler

Title: ReverseClassLoader

Description: An http server to provide remote class loading from a remote JVM.

Company: Helios Development Group LLC

Author:
Whitehead (nwhitehead AT heliosdev DOT org)
